suggest.meta_keywords: edge computing, cache, ModHeader Chrome extension, cache indicators, debugging edge applications, Chrome developer tools, HTTP headers, cache status, cache configuration, network diagnostics
suggest.meta_description: Learn how to use ModHeader Chrome Extension for debugging edge applications by monitoring HTTP headers to track cache statuses, configurations, and more in Google Chrome.

current.meta_description: You can debug requests to edge applications by creating headers that return cache indicators using the ModHeader extension for Google Chrome.
